idea-plugin.name: BrightScript Syntax
idea-plugin.description:
BrightScript syntax highlighting support for WebStorm and other JetBrains IDEs.

Features:

  • Syntax highlighting for BrightScript (.brs) files
  • Keywords, operators, and literals recognition
  • Comments and string highlighting
  • Support for BrightScript language constructs
  • Customizable color scheme
  • Code folding
  • Go to Declaration (Ctrl+Click on function calls)

About BrightScript:

BrightScript is a scripting language used for developing applications on Roku streaming devices. It is a BASIC-like language with object-oriented programming features.
